events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product does not meet my order.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving the incorrect item.
Assigned the case to agent Sarah B. specialized in handling refund cases for incorrect orders.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect product you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue quickly?
Sure, my order number is 458932, and I’ve attached a photo of the wrong product. I’m really disappointed this happened.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund for your order and provide a prepaid shipping label for the return of the incorrect item.
Thank you for the prompt response and solution. I appreciate the refund and the return shipping label.
The refund has been initiated to your original payment method, and the return label has been emailed to you for the incorrect product.
Checking in to confirm you received your refund and had no issues returning the wrong product with the provided label.
Yes, I received the refund and sent back the product using the label. Everything was handled smoothly, thank you!
Closing the case as the refund was successfully processed and the customer confirmed the return shipment was completed.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on their experience with the refund process.
